attributes.action: Close the borders and airports. Ban all travel during covid
attributes.additional_details:
If you want to save lives and stop the spread then surely closing the borders will help to do this just like you have closed schools and shops.
Allowing the borders etc to be open your are allowing things to happen that you are not allowing us to do!!!!!!! If this is a national lockdown then lock it down!!!
attributes.background: If we are in a national lockdown all borders and airports should be closed. If we can not go out of our house then there should be no body coming in or out of the country

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
